already_in_wordlist.message: was already assigned to the word list

application_description.message: Automatically finds and highlights words and phrases on the web page according to your list

application_title.message: Highlight This: finds and marks words

donate1.message: Hi, I hope you enjoy using Highlight This!

donate2.message: I'm developing the extension during my free time, support my work by donating 1$ / 1€.

donate3.message: Highlight This! will always stay Free

dontdonate.message: I don't want to donate now, continue to use for free

download_backup.message: Click this link if the file did not download automatically

field_colors_help.message: Select the colors in which the highlight should occur

field_neverHighlightOn_help.message:
List the sites on which you never want highlights to occur.

You can use wildcards such as * and ?.
examples *.google.com, www.google.com, www.google.com/something/page.html

field_sitesToHighlight.message: Define on which sites to highlight

field_words_help.message: You can use * and ? wildcards. Each new line is considered as a word.

field_words_regex_help.message: You can use Regex tokens such as [a-z], [1-9],

newGroupDetail.message:
A standard list allows you to manage words directly.
An external list, downloads a list of words from an exterrnal site (e.g. pastebin)

non_unicode_chars.message: you have added non unicode words to your list of words, uncheck the complete words detection to highlight them properly

notify_when_found.message: Notify when a word is found

perf_200.message: Default - adapts highlighting speed based on page update frequency

perf_300.message: Slow - rehighlighting goes a bit slower to save on resources

perf_400.message: No rehightlighting - extension only highlights once when the page is loaded

performanceHelp.message: Define how much impact Highlight This is allowed to have on your device resources (processing power).

popup_byline.message: The extension highlights all below words on the page

popup_confirmDelete.message: Are you sure you want to delete the list and its words?

popup_create1.message: Create a word list with words to have

popup_create2.message: detect and highlight them on web pages while browsing.

popup_foundWords.message: We have highlighted these words on this page.

popup_nowords.message: There are no word lists defined

popup_tip3.message: to browse through words on the page

refresh_page.message: Refresh the page to see new highlights.

sites_info.message:
List the sites on which you want highlights to occur. You can define a white- and a blacklist, the blacklist has priority.
If nothing is defined, highlights are set on all pages.

You can use wildcards such as * and ?.
examples: *.google.com, www.google.com, www.google.com/something/page.html, www.go?gle.com/*/page.html

sync_list_desc.message: A synchronized list is available in all your browsers when logged in to your browser, but it supports less words due to storage limitations.

sync_list_header.message: Do you want to sync this list between your browsers?

sync_list_no.message: No, do not synchronize this list

title_newGroupType.message: Where do you want to manage the words?

restoreWarning.message:
Restoring a backup of synchronized lists will only delete and restore the synchronized lists.
A restore of the non-synchronized lists will restore your configuration, and delete and restore only your non-synchronized lists.

migrate_sync_text.message: Change this list to a synchronised list, to make it available on all your browsers where you are logged in

migrate_local_text.message: Change this list to a local list, it will then only be available in this browser

migrate_sync_toobig_text.message: The list cannot be changed into a synchonised list because it is too large, limit the number of words to synchronise the list to all browsers where you are logged in

field_useRegexTokens_help.message: Use Regex tokens instead of simple * and ? wildcards

regex_too_many_matches.message: The regex is too broad it will make pages unresponsive

wordlist_too_long_for_sync_storage.message: The list is too long for being synchronised to other browsers

upgrade_to_premium_intro.message: Upgrade to Highlight This! Premium and benefit from more advanced highlighting features

upgrade_feature1.message: Use Google sheets to manage words

upgrade_feature2.message: Define actions when you click a highlight

upgrade_price_title.message: Highlight This! Premium is available for

subscription_enter_key_help.message: You can type or paste your license key, which you received by email, here

no_subscription_request.message: If you don't have a license, you can request one now

request_license_form.message: You can request a license key using this form. Once we receive your request we will issue you a temporary license key and contact you for billing/payment information

thanks_request_info.message: We will contact you very soon to exchange billing and payment information.

need_more_subscriptions.message: If you need more licenses, you can request them now

license_new_until.message: Your new license is valid until

license_expired_message.message: You are back on the free version

action_intro.message: Define the action to execute when clicking on a highlight

action_example.message: Example, a highlight of the word 'highlight' by using the token 'Hi?hL*', will result in:

action_tip1.message: %t% gets replaced by the text found on the page (eg Highlight)

action_tip2.message: %s% gets replaced by your search word (eg Hi?hL*)

action_tip3.message: %tu% or %tl%, %su% or %sl% forces in uppercase or lowercase

assistant_step_1.message: Make or open an existing a Google Sheets document.

assistant_step_2.message: In the first sheet, first column create your list of words.

assistant_step_3.message: Publish your sheet on the web
